rooms.description: A minimalistic entryway with built-in storage and a small sitting area.
Open-plan living and kitchen area, featuring a minimalist design with modular furniture, efficient cabinetry, integrated appliances, and ample natural light.
Spacious bedroom with a private balcony for relaxation and morning view, following Vastu principles to promote positive energy.

openings.description: Minimalist door with sliding mechanism to maximize space.
Floor-to-ceiling windows for enhanced natural lighting, ensuring proper ventilation as per Vastu guidelines.
Balcony door adjoining each bedroom for seamless outdoor access and fresh air.

garden.description: Large garden area adjacent to the living area, providing a natural extension of the open-plan space with indigenous plants to enhance sustainability.
